test.name: Cenario 01: Cadastrar novo usuário com sucesso na ServerRest

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Convert To Lower Case
kw.doc: Converts string to lower case.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Cadastrar o usuario criado na ServerRest
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverRest, url=https://serverest.dev, headers={'accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'accept': 'application/json', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '102'} body=b'{"nome": "Test Couto", "email": "kuenosiv4e@test.com.br", "password": "1234", "administrador": "true"}'
